models package¶

Submodules¶

models.floatbase module¶

models.floatbase.floatbase(model)[source]¶

Construct the floating-base equivalent of a fixed-base model.

Parameters:

model – A dictionary representing the fixed-base spatial kinematic tree.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the floating-base kinematic tree.

Return type:

fbmodel
